name: Beat Conquerors
description:
Beat Conquerors is a 1 v 1 strategy game where you paint your way to victory with cards throughout multiple maps

  • Conquer territory with cards
  • Advance faster with units
  • Surround the enemie to reconquer

Put your strategy skills to the test against your friends and prove you are the ultimate BEAT CONQUEROR

This project was made by

  • Albert Maymó: Programmer and Designer
  • Adrià Muñoz: Programmer and Designer
  • Joan Mesalles: Programmer, Designer and Sound Desing 
Downloading Instructions
  • Download the zip file
  • Extract the folder in the zip
  • Run the .exe file
